Articles.Content:
Does anybody know how to get surface pitch of my rocket in KOS Scriptable Autopilot System? I tried command 

> 
> ship: Direction: PITCH.

 But it returns always 0 value.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-29T14:24:39Z" title="06/29/2015 02:24  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 29, 2015</time> by Masaker**
